resource.title: Staff "Cash & Key" Accountability Log
resource.description: Physical logbook template and shared spreadsheet for tracking key handovers, petty cash, and lost & found items in cash-based economies.
resource.painPoint: Managing domestic help in cash-based economies creates risks of petty theft and key loss.
keyFeatures: Daily Key Handover: Sign-in/Sign-out logs for property keys
Petty Cash Ledger: Columns for tracking small purchases with receipt photo references
Lost & Found: Documenting guest items left behind to protect staff from accusation
Dual-Language Design: English + Local language for staff understanding
